entry.title: $2300 // TRUE 1BR | AMAZING LOCATION | GREAT DEAL
entry.content:
TRUE 1 BEDROOM
1 BATHROOM
PET FRIENDLY

IF YOU DON'T LIKE THIS APARTMENT, EMAIL OR TEXT/CALL show contact info. I WILL HELP YOU FIND A NEW HOME!


This great true 1BR, located just two blocks away from Central Park is available immediately. The apartment has been newly renovated and features great stainless steel appliances, including a DISHWASHER. Not only is it a true spacious 1 bedroom apartment in a well-maintained building, the location speaks for itself! You'll be living minutes away from some of the most important attractions of the Manhattan.
